{"id":916850264,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1679056870,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"153 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/916850264/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotonic Array","memory":"96.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isMonotonic(vector<int>& nums) {\n        bool isInc = false;\n        bool isDec = false;\n        int sz = nums.size();\n        for(int i = 0 ; i < sz-1 ; i ++)\n        {\n            if(nums[i] > nums[i+1])\n            {\n                isDec = true;\n                if(isInc)\n                {\n                    return false;\n                }\n            }\n            else if(nums[i] < nums[i+1])\n            {\n                isInc = true;\n                if(isDec)\n                {\n                    return false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotonic-array","has_notes":false}
